name: 01-Project Overview
content:
Collection Management -

Project Overview

Objective:

The primary objective of this project is to develop an Analytical App for Cash Flow Optimization that helps businesses evaluate payment behaviors of their customers and forecast the likelihood of delayed collections. Specifically, the system identifies customers who are more likely to settle debts promptly versus those likely to delay payments beyond 30 days from the invoice due date.

Approach:

The project follows a structured data science workflow:

  1. Data Ingestion & Profiling – Load AR/AP and collections datasets, validate completeness and accuracy.
  2. Data Preparation – Perform feature engineering to capture payment patterns, customer risk flags, write-offs, and collection status indicators.
  3. Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) – Use descriptive analytics to understand trends in industry distribution, late payments, and customer risk behaviors.
  4. Predictive Modeling – Train a Random Forest model (H2O) to predict late payment likelihood, using engineered features.
  5. Evaluation & Insights – Assess model performance using classification metrics and extract feature importance for business interpretability.
  6. Deployment in Analytical App – Provide dashboards and reports with both descriptive and predictive insights to support collection teams.

Significance:

Effective cash flow management is critical for business sustainability. Late payments strain liquidity, increase working capital requirements, and reduce operational efficiency. This app empowers finance and collection teams with data-driven insights to prioritize actions, reduce write-offs, and optimize recovery efforts.

Benefits:

  • Improved cash flow predictability.
  • Reduced bad debt risk and write-offs.
  • Prioritization of high-risk customers for proactive collection strategies.
  • Enhanced collection efficiency through data-driven insights.
  • Strategic visibility into industry-specific payment patterns.

Expected Outcomes:

  • Accurate prediction of late payment probability (30+ days overdue).
  • Comprehensive dashboards showing:
  • Industry-wise collection performance.
  • Outstanding vs. Write-off amounts.
  • Revenue impact of delayed collections.
  • Improved collection success rate and reduced DSO (Days Sales Outstanding).
